name: Susanowo, the Ten-Fist Sword
text: Swiftness (This card can attack and play its abilities the same turn it enters a field.) Pierce Continuous: If your opponent controls a Dragon, you may pay less to play this card. Enter: You may add a card named "Ame-no-Habakiri" from your hand to this card. Enter: This card deals damage equal to its ATK to target resonator your opponent controls.
